chunks.text: 3 is greater than 4.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: let me show you its preview.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, it has written 3 is greater than 4 here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Now, let's say I write here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: this is the code for paragraph.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And I write something like this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Now, I have written this here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: I want it to appear here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: But, you can see that it won't appear here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Why won't it appear here?

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Because how will it know that I want to write the paragraph code

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: or I want to use this P tag as a syntax.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, HTML entities are used to avoid this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Now, let me tell you what HTML entities are.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: If you write here amp%lt semicolon,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: lt for less than,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then you can write it as lt semicolon.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Now, if you write amp%lt semicolon here

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: and replace it with amp%lt semicolon,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: and the greater than is simple,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: you can replace it with amp%gt semicolon.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Let me show you this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: If you replace it with amp%gt semicolon,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then what will happen is

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: it will appear here as it is written.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: As you can see, let me zoom in and show you.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, what happens is that HTML entities are used

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: to write things that may collide with HTML syntax.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: What does it mean to collide?

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: If we write the paragraph tag code here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then how will HTML entities know that it is a paragraph tag code

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: or you actually want to write this as it is.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: There is a pre tag for this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: If you put anything in the pre tag and you write here

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then p thisisaperra.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, if you write it like this,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then it will appear here as it is written.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: As you can see.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: It will appear as it is.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And along with that,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: if you write new lines here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: thisisafterfuenewlines.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And some more.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: If you write it like this,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then it will appear as it is.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: All spaces are intact.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: All new lines are intact.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: But here it's not like tags will show up.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: We'll have to use entities for tags.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, this is pre tag HTML.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, we've seen entities.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: We've seen pre tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: If you want to put a copyright symbol,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then you can write amp% copy semicolon.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And as you write amp% copy semicolon here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then you'll see a copyright symbol here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: As you can see.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, you can do such things with the help of HTML entities.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, you can try out all these examples.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Non-breaking spaces.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Along with that, you can use special symbols like

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: we've seen copyright.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Amp% NBSP space is used.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And it's very important.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, if I write here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: copyright.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: I write copyright here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And suppose I want for some reason

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: to see a lot of spaces here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And I write code with Harry here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, if I write copyright code with Harry,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then this space will be considered as a fake space.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Because the extra spaces in HTML are ignored.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, if you see here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: the code with Harry came immediately after the copyright.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: But ideally, we don't want that.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: What we want is that the spaces that I've put here should come.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, don't put spaces.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: You put amp% NBSP.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: The more you put amp% NBSP, the more spaces you'll get.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: You see here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: These spaces are coming.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, whenever you want to put literally spaces in your HTML code,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: amp% NBSP is something you should go after.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: how to put these breaking spaces.

chunks.text: And along with that,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: After this,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: what is quotation tag?

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Quotation tag helps you to write quotations like this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: I'll also give you an example of quotation tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, quotation tag works like this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And as you write here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: this is quotation text here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, what will happen is that search engines will know

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: that you are actually writing quotations.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And you can also style it with CSS.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Then, you can put the URL of anything you want to cite.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Similarly, you can also use the Q tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Cite is equal to,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: you can put the URL here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, you can cite any research article.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Or there can be other reasons like if you want to cite Wikipedia,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: then you can use this tag.

chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And you can obviously style it with CSS.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: So, these are our quotation tags.

chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: And HTML entities.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
chunks.text: Then, some HTML tags are obsolete.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML
